info.title: Box
info.description: Boxâ„¢ is a service that keeps your files safe, synced, and easy to share. Connect to Box to manage your files. You can perform various actions such as upload, update, get, and delete files in Box.

get.description: Retrieves the file metadata from Box using file id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the file in Box.

put.description: Updates an existing file in Box.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the file to update in Box.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The content of the file to update in Box.

delete.description: Deletes an existing file from Box.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the file to delete from Box.

patch.description: Append content to an existing file in Box.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the file to append to in Box.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The content of the file to append in Box.

get.description: Retrieves the file metadata from Box using path.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The unique path to the file in Box.

get.description: Retrieves the file contents from Box using path.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The unique path to the file in Box.

parameters.name: inferContentType
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) to infer content-type based on extension.

get.description: Retrieves the file content from Box using id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the file in Box.

parameters.name: inferContentType
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) to infer content-type based on extension.

parameters.name: folderPath
parameters.description: The folder path to upload the file to Box.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the file to create in Box.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The content of the file to upload to Box.

post.description: Copy a file to a file path in Box.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The url to source file.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The destination file path in Box, including target filename.

parameters.name: overwrite
parameters.description: Overwrites the destination file if set to 'true'.

get.summary: When a file is created (properties only) (V2)
get.description: This operation triggers a flow when a new file is created in a folder. The trigger does not fire if a file is added/updated in a subfolder. If it is required to trigger on subfolders, multiple triggers should be created. In case when 'Split On' option is turned off for Trigger->Settings successful trigger runs may produce empty array for 'List of Files' output.

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the folder.

parameters.name: maxFileCount
parameters.description: Maximum number of files to return by single trigger run (1-100). Note that 'Split On' setting can force trigger to process each item individually.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, add a file to the Box folder you selected.

get.summary: When a file is modified (properties only) (V2)
get.description: This operation triggers a flow when a file is modified in a folder. The trigger does not fire if a file is added/updated in a subfolder. If it is required to trigger on subfolders, multiple triggers should be created. In case when 'Split On' option is turned off for Trigger->Settings successful trigger runs may produce empty array for 'List of Files' output.

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: Select a folder

parameters.name: maxFileCount
parameters.description: Maximum number of files to return by single trigger run (1-100). Note that 'Split On' setting can force trigger to process each item individually.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, modify a file in the Box folder you selected.

get.description: Triggers a flow when a new file is created in a Box folder. The trigger does not fire if a file is added/updated in a subfolder. If it is required to trigger on subfolders, multiple triggers should be created.

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the folder in Box.

parameters.name: inferContentType
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) to infer content-type based on extension.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, add a file to the Box folder you selected.

get.description: Triggers a flow when a file is modified in a Box folder. The trigger does not fire if a file is added/updated in a subfolder. If it is required to trigger on subfolders, multiple triggers should be created.

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the folder in Box.

parameters.name: includeFileContent
parameters.description: If set to true, file content will also be retrieved along with the trigger response.

parameters.name: inferContentType
parameters.description: A boolean value (true, false) to infer content-type based on extension.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, modify a file in the Box folder you selected.

get.summary: When a file is created (properties only)
get.description: This operation triggers a flow when a new file is created in a folder. The trigger does not fire if a file is added/updated in a subfolder. If it is required to trigger on subfolders, multiple triggers should be created.

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the folder.

parameters.name: maxFileCount
parameters.description: Maximum number of files to return by single trigger run (1-100). Note that 'Split On' setting can force trigger to process each item individually.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, add a file to the Box folder you selected.

get.summary: When a file is modified (properties only)
get.description: This operation triggers a flow when a file is modified in a folder. The trigger does not fire if a file is added/updated in a subfolder. If it is required to trigger on subfolders, multiple triggers should be created.

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: Select a folder

parameters.name: maxFileCount
parameters.description: Maximum number of files to return by single trigger run (1-100). Note that 'Split On' setting can force trigger to process each item individually.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, modify a file in the Box folder you selected.

get.summary: List files and folders in folder
get.description: Lists the files and folders in a Box folder.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the folder in Box.

get.summary: List files and folders in root folder
get.description: Lists the files and folders in the Box root folder.

post.description: Extracts an archive file into a folder in Box (example: .zip).

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The path to the archive file.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The path in Box to extract the archive contents.

parameters.name: overwrite
parameters.description: Overwrites the destination files if set to 'true'.

Id.description: The unique id of the file or folder.

Name.description: The name of the file or folder.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the file or folder.

Path.description: The path of the file or folder.

LastModified.description: The date and time the file or folder was last modified.

Size.description: The size of the file or folder.

MediaType.description: The media type of the file or folder.

IsFolder.description: A boolean value (true, false) to indicate whether or not the blob is a folder.

ETag.description: The etag of the file or folder.

FileLocator.description: The filelocator of the file or folder.

LastModifiedBy.description: The user who last modified the file or folder.

Id.description: The unique id of the file or folder.

Name.description: The name of the file or folder.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the file or folder.

Path.description: The path of the file or folder.

LastModified.description: The date and time the file or folder was last modified.

Size.description: The size of the file or folder.

MediaType.description: The media type of the file or folder.

IsFolder.description: A boolean value (true, false) to indicate whether or not the blob is a folder.

ETag.description: The etag of the file or folder.

FileLocator.description: The filelocator of the file or folder.

BlobMetadataPage.description: Represents a page of blob metadata.
